data.name: Alejandro Batres
data.bio:
Some people call me 'Ralex' or 'Batres'. I'm 22 years old and I study Engineering in Computer Science at BUAP. I'm a software developer who really likes coding software and creating videogame-based content on the internet.

I have experience coding in different programming languages such as C, C++, Java, Python, and currently JavaScript, mostly aiming into desktop applications. I like to create web applications and I want to dive into videogame development.

My favorite hobbies lay around videogames (totally unexpected). That is, I like to play videogames, I like to consume and create videogame content, and I even listen to videogame music.

I've also done internet content with friends since I like to create multimedia content such as videos and images.
